about_the_game:
Radiant Smiles, AI Gallery

This app is an entertainment experience where you can enjoy stunning AI-generated female art (photos and short movies) and play games using these artworks.

With the gallery feature, you can view a slideshow of diverse and beautiful AI-generated images and short movies.

Select your favorite picture and challenge yourself with a slide puzzle, allowing you to experience both beauty and fun at the same time.

By clearing the puzzle, you unlock short movies as rewards, which you can enjoy anytime.

Immerse yourself in the elegance of AI art while indulging in a mentally stimulating game experience.

※ New themed series will be released sequentially in this gallery.

Dynamic Beauties Watching You in the City

In "City Girls," you can enjoy AI-generated artwork of 300 beautiful Japanese women.

Instructions

In the "Settings" menu, you can adjust the clock, date settings, font size, and viewing duration.

Right-clicking opens a menu for quick adjustments.

Photos viewed in Gallery Mode are displayed as thumbnails.
Selecting a photo enlarges it on the left side, allowing you to play a slide puzzle or watch a short movie.
Clearing the slide puzzle rewards you with a short movie.

Overview

Enjoy breathtaking AI-generated videos and images that change over time.

Play games using the viewed photos.

Clear the game to unlock a reward: a beautiful short video.

※ The videos used in this software are created with "KLING AI."

※ Since the photos and videos are AI-generated, some minor inconsistencies may be present. Please enjoy them as part of the experience.

name: AI Gallery ”City Girls”

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: The 2st generation Intel® Core™ processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD2500/4000 Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This app is an entertainment experience where you can enjoy stunning AI-generated female art (photos and short movies) and play games using these artworks. In "City Girls," you can enjoy AI-generated artwork of 300 beautiful Japanese women.
